mapper.select: SELECT id, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TEXTBOOK_TYPE,'JCLX') as textbookType, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.TEXTBOOK_ID,'T_JW_TEXTBOOK','TEXTBOOK_ID','TEXTBOOK_NAME') textbookId, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.OPERATION_TYPE,'KCCZLX') as operationType, t.OPERATION_NUM as operationNum, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.creator) as creator, to_char(t.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') createTime, t.operation_time operationTime, t.remark FROM T_JW_TEXTBOOK_LOG t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.OPERATION_NUM !='0' AND t.TEXTBOOK_ID = #{textbookId}
mapper.update: update T_JW_TEXTBOOK t SET t.TEXTBOOK_NUM_ALL=t.TEXTBOOK_NUM_ALL+to_number(#{operationNum}), t.TEXTBOOK_NUM_IN=t.TEXTBOOK_NUM_IN+to_number(#{operationNum}), t.changer = #{changer}, t.change_time = sysdate, t.change_dept = #{changeDept} WHERE t.textbook_id = #{textbookId}

SELECT t1.TEXTBOOK_ID, t1.TEXTBOOK_NAME, t1.TEXTBOOK_NUMBER, t1.MAJOR_CODE majorCode, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.TEXTBOOK_TYPE,'JCLX') textbookType, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.TEXTBOOK_CATEGORY,'JCLB') TEXTBOOK_CATEGORY, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.TEXTBOOK_NATURE,'JCXZ') textbook_nature, t1.PUBLISHING_HOUSE, t1.FIRST_EDITOR_COMPANY, t1.EDITOR, t1.EDITION, t1.PRICE, t1.TEXTBOOK_NUM_ALL, t1.TEXTBOOK_NUM_IN, t1.subscribe_code, t1.REMARK, to_char(t1.version_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') versionDate, t1.create_time, t1.TEXTBOOK_NUM_IN textbookNumIn, t1.DISCOUNT discount FROM T_JW_TEXTBOOK t1 WHERE 1=1
AND t1.TEXTBOOK_NAME LIKE '%${textbookName}%'
AND t1.textbook_number LIKE '%'||#{textbookNumber}||'%'
AND t1.textbook_nature = #{textbookNature}
order by t1.create_time desc
